ref.Programmability.Name: StateUnderProgram13_16
ref.Programmability.CreateCommand: CREATE FUNCTION [sbor].[StateUnderProgram13_16] (@id int, @DocType VARCHAR(128)) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN ( --построенна на основе сноске 13 14 15 16 ПФ ПОДПРОГРАММА ГОСУДАРСТВЕННОЙ ПРОГРАММЫ SELECT SPDGKA.NumberN AS GoalIndicator--наименование ВЦП или Основной цели ,FS.Caption AS NumberName -- наименование финансого показателя ,SPDGKARMV.Value AS GIValue --Значение ,YEAR(HP.DateEnd) AS NumYear --Год FROM doc.StateProgram AS SP INNER JOIN ( SELECT DGPA.id AS id ,DGPA.idOwner AS idOwner ,@DocType + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DGPA.Caption DESC) AS VARCHAR(32)) + '. ' + DGPA.Caption AS NumberN--номер строки FROM tp.StateProgram_DepartmentGoalProgramAndKeyActivity AS DGPA INNER JOIN ref.DocType AS DT ON DGPA.idDocType = DT.id WHERE DT.Caption = @DocType AND DGPA.idOwner = @id ) AS SPDGKA ON SPDGKA.idOwner = SP.id LEFT JOIN tp.StateProgram_DGPKAResourceMaintenance AS SPDGKARM --Ресурсное обеспечение ВЦП и основных мероприятий ON SPDGKARM.idMaster = SPDGKA.id LEFT JOIN ref.FinanceSource AS FS --Источники финансирования ON FS.id = SPDGKARM.idFinanceSource LEFT JOIN tp.StateProgram_DGPKAResourceMaintenance_Value AS SPDGKARMV --Ресурсное обеспечение ВЦП и основных мероприятий - значения ON SPDGKARMV.idMaster = SPDGKARM.id LEFT JOIN ref.HierarchyPeriod AS HP ON HP.id = SPDGKARMV.idHierarchyPeriod WHERE SP.id = @id );
